name: Recipe Remixer
description: A web application that allows users to input a list of ingredients and receive a variety of recipe suggestions, along with the ability to customize and "remix" those suggestions based on dietary restrictions or preferences. This empowers users to creatively use existing ingredients and minimize food waste.
features: Ingredient Input: Users can enter a list of ingredients they have on hand.
Recipe Suggestions: The application fetches recipe suggestions from an external API (e.g., Spoonacular) based on the provided ingredients.
Customization Filters: Users can filter suggestions based on dietary restrictions (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free) and cuisine preferences.
Recipe Remixing: Users can adjust ingredient quantities or swap ingredients within a suggested recipe to create a customized version.
Saved Recipes: Users can save their favorite or remixed recipes for later access.
Share Functionality: Users can share their remixed recipes via social media or email.
target_audience: Home cooks, individuals looking to reduce food waste, and those seeking recipe inspiration based on available ingredients.
ui_ux_notes: - Clean and Simple Interface:  Focus on a user-friendly layout with clear input fields, filter options, and recipe display. - Responsive Design: Ensure the application works well on different devices (desktop, tablet, mobile). - Visual Appeal: Use Tailwind CSS to create a visually engaging and modern interface.

features: Daily Entry Creation: Users can create new journal entries for each day, with automatic date stamping.

Export to Text: Users can export all journal entries as a plain text file for backup or sharing.
Word Count: Displays the word count of the current entry, encouraging concise writing.
target_audience: Individuals seeking a simple and accessible way to journal, focusing on brief entries and mindful reflection.

Description: A personal timeline journaling application where users can visually document and explore their life events. Users create entries with dates, descriptions, and optional images, forming an interactive and searchable timeline of their experiences. This promotes reflection and provides a unique way to visualize personal history.
Target Audience: Individuals who enjoy journaling, reflecting on their past, and visualizing their life journey.
Key Functionalities:
- Entry Creation: Add entries with dates, titles, and detailed descriptions of events.
- Image Upload:  Attach images to entries to enhance visual storytelling.
- Timeline Visualization: Display entries chronologically on an interactive timeline.
- Filtering/Search:  Filter entries by date range or search for specific keywords.
- Entry Editing/Deletion:  Edit or delete existing entries.
- Data Export: Export timeline data as a JSON or text file.
UI/UX Considerations:
- Responsive Design: Ensure the timeline adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes.
- Intuitive Navigation:  Easy scrolling and zooming on the timeline.
- Visually Appealing Cards:  Display each entry as a visually engaging card with optional images.
Suggested Folder Structure:
- index.html
- js/script.js
- js/timeline.js
- js/storage.js
- js/ui.js

name: Mood Music Maestro
description: A web application that curates Spotify playlists based on the user's current mood. Users select their mood from a range of options, and the app dynamically generates a Spotify playlist link using the Spotify API. This provides a personalized and seamless music listening experience tailored to the user's emotional state.
features: Mood Selection: Users select their current mood from a visually appealing list of options (e.g., happy, sad, energetic, relaxed).
Playlist Generation:  The app fetches relevant tracks from the Spotify API based on the selected mood using appropriate keywords and genre filtering.
Spotify Playlist Link:  Generates a shareable link to the curated Spotify playlist.
Playlist Preview: Displays a preview of the playlist, including track titles and artists (if feasible with API limitations).
Mood History:  Saves the user's recent mood selections locally for quick access.
Customization Options: Allows users to specify preferred genres or artists to further personalize the playlist generation.
target_audience: Music lovers, anyone seeking mood-enhancing music, and users who enjoy discovering new music based on their feelings.
ui_ux_notes: - Intuitive Mood Selection:  Visually appealing and easy-to-use mood selection interface. - Responsive Design:  Adapts to different screen sizes for seamless use on various devices. - Dynamic Feedback:  Provides visual feedback during playlist generation and link creation.

name: Personalized Book Tracker
description: A web application that allows users to track their reading progress, set reading goals, and visualize their reading habits.  Users can add books, log reading sessions, and gain insights into their reading preferences.  It's a powerful tool for book lovers to manage and celebrate their reading journey.
features: Add Book:  Add books to the tracker with title, author, and optional cover image.
Log Reading Session:  Log reading sessions by specifying the book and the number of pages read.
Set Reading Goals: Set daily or weekly reading goals (e.g., number of pages or reading time).
Progress Visualization:  Visualize reading progress using charts or graphs (e.g., pages read per day, books completed per month).
Reading History: View a history of past reading sessions and completed books.
Search/Filter: Search for books by title or author, and filter by status (e.g., currently reading, completed).
Export Data: Export reading data as a CSV or JSON file.
target_audience: Avid readers, book clubs, and anyone who wants to track and analyze their reading habits.
ui_ux_notes: - Clean and Intuitive Interface:  Easy-to-use forms for adding books and logging sessions. - Mobile-First Design:  Ensure the app is fully responsive and works well on mobile devices. - Data Visualization:  Clear and engaging charts to visualize reading progress and habits.

name: Virtual Vision Board
description: A web application that allows users to create and personalize digital vision boards. Users can add images, text affirmations, and goals, arranging them visually to represent their aspirations and dreams. This provides a dynamic and accessible way to manifest goals and maintain focus.
features: Image Uploading: Drag and drop or select images from the device to add to the vision board.
Text Input: Add text affirmations, quotes, or goals directly onto the board.
Element Styling: Customize the appearance of elements (size, color, font) using Tailwind classes.
Drag and Drop Positioning: Arrange elements freely on the board using drag-and-drop functionality.
Background Customization: Choose from a selection of background colors or upload a custom background image.
Saving/Loading Boards: Save and load vision boards locally in the browser.
Sharing (Optional): Generate a shareable link to the vision board (implementation may depend on chosen saving method).
target_audience: Individuals seeking motivation, goal-setters, and anyone who enjoys visual organization and creative expression.
ui_ux_notes: - Intuitive Drag and Drop: Smooth and responsive drag-and-drop interactions for arranging elements. - Responsive Design: Ensure the vision board adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes. - Visually Appealing Layout: Provide options for grid layouts or free-form arrangement.

name: Recipe Remixer
description: A web application that allows users to input a list of ingredients they have on hand and receive recipe suggestions based on those ingredients. Users can then customize the suggested recipes and save their favorites.  This helps reduce food waste and provides culinary inspiration based on available resources.
features: Ingredient Input: Users input a list of ingredients they have on hand.
Recipe Suggestion: The application suggests recipes that primarily use the entered ingredients, potentially using a dummy dataset or a placeholder for a future API integration.
Recipe Customization: Users can adjust serving sizes, modify ingredients, and add notes to the suggested recipes.
Favorite Recipes: Users can save their favorite customized recipes for easy access later.
Recipe Filtering: Filter recipes by dietary restrictions (vegetarian, vegan, etc.) or cuisine type.
Recipe Sharing (Optional - could be simplified):  Share recipes via a simple copy/paste link functionality.
target_audience: Home cooks, people looking to reduce food waste, and those seeking recipe inspiration based on available ingredients.
ui_ux_notes: - Clean and User-Friendly Interface: Easy-to-use input fields and clear recipe presentation. - Responsive Design: Adapts to different screen sizes for use on various devices. - Visual Appeal:  Display recipe suggestions with appealing images (placeholders initially).
folder_structure: js/recipes.js  # Contains dummy recipe data or handles API interaction

name: Daily Dose of Delight
description: A web application that delivers a daily dose of positive affirmations, inspiring quotes, and calming micro-meditations. Users can customize the content categories, set notification reminders, and track their engagement to cultivate a more positive and mindful daily routine.
features: Content Customization: Select preferred categories of content (affirmations, quotes, meditations).
Daily Delivery: Receive a new piece of content each day based on selected categories.
Notification Reminders: Set custom reminder times to receive daily content notifications.
Content Interaction: Mark content as "favorited" or "completed."
Streaks Tracking: Track daily engagement streaks to motivate consistent practice.
Offline Access: Store recent content locally for offline viewing.
Content Sharing: Share favorite content via social media or copy/paste.
target_audience: Individuals seeking daily motivation, stress reduction, and a boost of positivity.
ui_ux_notes: - Clean and Minimalist Design: A calming and distraction-free interface. - Mobile-First Approach: Optimized for mobile devices with responsive design. - Subtle Animations: Smooth transitions and animations to enhance user engagement.

name: Wanderlust Wishlist
description: A visual travel planning application where users can create and manage their dream travel destinations. Users can add destinations with images, descriptions, and planned activities, organizing their wanderlust and inspiring future adventures.  It serves as a personalized travel bucket list and planning tool.
features: Add Destination: Add new destinations with location names, descriptions, and optional images.
Activity Planning: Create a list of planned activities for each destination.
Categorization: Categorize destinations by region, country, or travel style (e.g., adventure, relaxation).
Visual Display: Display destinations as visually appealing cards with images and summaries.
Search/Filter: Search for destinations by name or filter by category.
Mark as Visited: Mark destinations as "visited" to track travel experiences.
target_audience: Travel enthusiasts, aspiring adventurers, and anyone who enjoys planning and dreaming about future trips.
ui_ux_notes: - Interactive Map Integration (Optional - could be simplified):  Display destinations on a map for a visual overview. - Responsive Design: Adapt to different screen sizes for seamless use on various devices. - Visually Engaging Cards:  Present destination information in attractive and informative cards.
folder_structure: js/map.js # Optional: if map integration is implemented
css/style.css  # Optional: if additional styling beyond Tailwind is necessary
assets/placeholder.jpg # Optional: Placeholder image for destinations
